    • Method Detail

      • withCustomTagHelper

        public SSCCustomTagAPI.SSCApplicationVersionCustomTagUpdater withCustomTagHelper(SSCCustomTagAPI.SSCCustomTagHelper helper)
        Set the SSCCustomTagAPI.SSCCustomTagHelper instance to be used in case any mapping between custom tag names and id's needs to be done, for example when calling the byName(Map) or byName(String, String) methods. If not set, a new SSCCustomTagAPI.SSCCustomTagHelper instance will be created when needed. As this will potentially result in additional SSC API calls, it is recommended to re-use an existing SSCCustomTagAPI.SSCCustomTagHelper instance if possible. For optimal performance, this method should be called before calling any of the other methods.
        Parameters:
        helper - SSCCustomTagAPI.SSCCustomTagHelper instance
        Returns:
        Self for chaining

      • forVulnerability

        public SSCCustomTagAPI.SSCApplicationVersionCustomTagUpdater forVulnerability(Object vulnerability)
        Specify a single vulnerability for which custom tags should be updated. The given vulnerability is expected to contain 'id' and 'revision' properties; usually this information is returned by the SSC issues endpoint.
        Parameters:
        vulnerability - for which to update one or more custom tags
        Returns:
        Self for chaining

      • forVulnerabilities

        public SSCCustomTagAPI.SSCApplicationVersionCustomTagUpdater forVulnerabilities(Collection<Object> vulnerabilities)
        Specify a collection of vulnerabilities for which custom tags should be updated. See forVulnerability(Object) for a description of expected format of the individual entries.
        Parameters:
        vulnerabilities - for which to update one or more custom tags
        Returns:
        Self for chaining
